column3:
“Bow down to the KING KUSH! Wow! I've been eying this strain at Delta 9 in Van Nuys - researching the shit out of King Kush. And I could not wait until I could taste such a beautiful flower.

I usually focus on hybrids and sativas as I really love the cranial love I get from them. But today I had to get a gram of the King Kush. This is indica gold... Midas is touching my brain right now and I am blissing out at the ...”

“Insidious high that lasts for a while. tingly, warm fuzzy feelings. makes you think about stuff and how it affects everything else. taste is, well let's be serious folks, tastes like sweet weed with a hint of something spicy as i smoke it as a joint. obviously creativity is still coherent. or not. SMOKE IT!”
“can't move for shit brah”

“King's Kush is straight up DANK, definitely meant for kings! Very powerful effects, very potent strain, highly recommend to vet's and even new comers but with caution. This strain is everything you want an Indica to be, couch lock is inevitable but it also has a very relaxing numbing sensation which is what I like the most about it. Great for insomnia, pain, spasms, depression & anxiety. If you see this strain at you...”

“King Kush has such an amazing smell of Lavender, Grapes and citrus . witch really through me off such a different combination of aromas coming out of this flower , and for the medical use i noticed this would be a good all day smoke for someone dealing with immense pain or someone with a bit higher tolerance to like this for a day smoke because there is a nice uplifting heady high and an instant mood changer to help ...”

“My favourite part of this strain was the taste. The smoke was so gentle and rich that I couldn't get enough of smoking it just for the sole purpose of tasting the smoke.
Excellent strain if you're looking to reduce sleeping issues or stress (that's what I used it for, most effective of the strains I've tried more than once). 
Got some headaches from it though. Probably induced by my lack of restraint when smoking t...”

“Picked this up for 8 bucks per g and couldn't be happier with it. Amazing bag appeal. Sugared nugs covered in almost seasalt looking trichomes. Flower is dark green with a tad of purple mixed in. Smell is classic kush, and when you open the jar it hits you like a train. Pungent kush taste follows through to the last vape draw. Onset is a tingling in on the hands and a vibration in the vision. An overall feeling of we...”
“I found this strain to have the placebo" effect. Sesh with the ideal plan being I wanna get stuff done
column4: and I'm full of energy for hours. Sesh with the ideal plan of wanting to sleep and just pass the f out! Wonderful smoke..kinda harsh but doesn't leave you coughing up a lung. Sweet taste and def has a nice stank to it.”"

column3: “Love this strain, such pretty buds. Purply green buds with a nice silver coating. Tastes like OG with a hint of grape. Some couch lock, but nothing you couldn't fix with a coffee. I love OG and Grape so this is just a give in.  Pressed into really nice rosin, with a good return.”
“Great Indica that doesn't just knock you out. However munchies are abundant and plentiful with this strain. Like it's literally hard to stop eating lol. So snack down with these boat times !”
“Scary strong for a newbie takes a while for it to take affect but once it does if you're not used to smoking it can scare you.”
“Lemony flavor, very smooth smoke. Bred by musicians, Kottonmouth Kings”

“I'm biased because I'm a Kush guy all the way, but this one surprised even a kushhead like me with its nice sweet and pine scented, trichome frosted nugs and the intense tingly relaxation that smoking this brought me.

Like others have said the come up is quick and it's a full blown tingly body high that just melts away stress and leaves you totally relaxed.

 While I use this one even in the mornings it's best for a...”

“Read reviews and decided to take this for a smoke. All comments are true. Fast hitting high. Very smooth easy smoke, and the fruity smoke scent was enjoyable. Cotton mouth happen quickly but i was prepared with a drinl near by.”

“this strain is very very strong 9.5 easily. the taste is amazing and the high is incredible, i feel very happy and relaxed but ready to do whatever, pick some up if you can its a very smart thing to do. the bud looks amazing and the smell super potent some of the best weed iv ever had.”
“I’m high and horny lol”

“I got a few O's from a medical grow op out of Edwards, C.O.  -  Testing at 20.2% THC

This stuff was grown so well, gorgeous airy kushy buds, with fiery orange hairs, & a blanket of white trichs.  The terpene profiles really carries the traditional OG attributes, earthy piney, deliciousness with a touch of sweet.  The effects were great for pain, stress, and anxiety.  It made me very relaxed for a good 2 hours but no...”

“This strain is very very potent. These effects come on very slowly, but when they do finally hit you, you will be blown away. First off, if you have any pain it will simply melt away. Also, this is a very clean high although it may take a little bit of willpower to maintain around other people. This will make you very sociable and laugh a lot. The trichome coverage makes it ideal for vaping. It has an amazing smell b...”

“Read reviews and decided to take this for a smoke. All comments are true. Fast hitting high. Very smooth easy smoke, and the fruity smoke scent was enjoyable. Cotton mouth happen quickly but i was prepared with a drinl near by.”
“I’m high and horny lol”
“Love kings kush. 🔥👌🏻💨🍁”
“One of my favorite Kush strains. My favorite smelling kush with maybe a bit more piney of a flavor. Very unique flavor and great effects.”

“Got this from Delta 9 Collective In Van Nuys California.
The genetics i believe are Bubba Kush crossed with a Secret Sativa. 
Gives You a uplifting euphoric feel that makes you wanna listen to music and have a good time.
Puts you in a state of complete and free anxiety.
It is covered in crystals and dark red hairs its like nothing i've ever seen before. The smell was straight bubba with a little bit of a piney un...”
“Iv had horrible migrains and the king kush helped comfort the pain very well. Im a big fan of it now. Two thumbs up”

“Doesn't smell as strong as OG or Hindu, but possesses the classic kush taste on smoking. Rolled a smaller one-paper (RAWs) and smoked about a third at first for a comfortable lift-off. At this lower dose I was happy and productive. I picked up the guitar for a bit and I was even able to do some research reading (and retain the info lol!). I didn't notice any body effects at that point aside from being more relaxed. I...”
“Used for back pain and spasm relief. Very small dosage with magic flight worked well.”

“The taste of this is KING! The kings kush has quickly become a favorite of mine, super mellow and packs a real punch. Definitely put me to sleep! It's a super sweet tasting kush that absolutely sparkles with trichromes in the light! Well rounded and overall straight 🔥🔥🔥”
“Iv had horrible migrains and the king kush helped comfort the pain very well. Im a big fan of it now. Two thumbs up”
“This bud will get you higher than you've ever been in a while. Tastes and smells very fruity, almost like grapefruit.”

“Got this from Delta 9 Collective In Van Nuys California.
The genetics i believe are Bubba Kush crossed with a Secret Sativa. 
Gives You a uplifting euphoric feel that makes you wanna listen to music and have a good time.
Puts you in a state of complete and free anxiety.
It is covered in crystals and dark red hairs its like nothing i've ever seen before. The smell was straight bubba with a little bit of a piney un...”

“This strain was an interesting discovery for the group.  We found ourselves sitting around the kitchen table just passing each bowl.  Kings was a little ruff causing Cough Dancing.  It got all of us talking and locked into our seats just having a nice relaxing conversation.”

“I accidentally listed this incorrectly as a hybrid the first time I wrote journal entries so here's what I wrote previously: 

Your King's Kush CBD History
You have tried King's Kush CBD 2 time(s), giving it an average rating of 4.0.

4/28/2014
Tried it in my new vaporizer. Worked quickly to reduce my pain and I spent a few hours with the family then slept well. I did get itchy that night but I suspect that was from ...”

“One of the best purple strains out there(some cuts are green ours isn't started from seed purple through and through). If you go to the produce section of your grocery store when all the good stuff is in season that's what this stuff smells like in the grow room. And in the bag. Not as Kush tasting as say ogxbubba cross or just bubba. But as far as smell high visual appeal density and just about anything else this sh...”

“This is my new nightly vape. My 2nd review of this beautiful flower, King Kush. Picked up a gram at Delta 9 in Van Nuys and I'm going back for more.

I said the vape flavor was like candied lemon rind, but it's more like dried lime leaves, like the really good Spanish imported... dried lime leaves and spruce. Delish!

The high goes right to the head, softly pushes out and them it drops down into your body and jus...”
“Versatile in low quantities, can get sleepy with too much. Good price makes this an easy purchase.”
“This strain was an early-noon strain.It felt more of the 60%sativa 40%indica (though its 50/50). When i smoked this strain-i was hit with a clean chemically taste. I laughed and thought  yeah
column4: you are a lil boujee ". You can see and taste the quality. Its a bright lime green color. I found mysekf wanting to hold onto this strain toward the end. It was perfect knowing i could have a bowl of this before cooking dinner...”"

column3: “This is what id call a platinum level strain. The medicinal properties are impressive and the high is magical and relaxing but uplifting and motivating as well. Not easily found in an indica.”

“nice sticky crystally buds.......smoking in a vaporizer for fybromyalgia. it is a nice creeping high. started nice and mellow and kept on going until i went to bed. pain relief 8 out of 10...made me sleep well.”

“This strain was an interesting discovery for the group.  We found ourselves sitting around the kitchen table just passing each bowl.  Kings was a little ruff causing Cough Dancing.  It got all of us talking and locked into our seats just having a nice relaxing conversation.”
“A good smooth nighttime strain.. Has a Berry sweet flavour”

“One of the best purple strains out there(some cuts are green ours isn't started from seed purple through and through). If you go to the produce section of your grocery store when all the good stuff is in season that's what this stuff smells like in the grow room. And in the bag. Not as Kush tasting as say ogxbubba cross or just bubba. But as far as smell high visual appeal density and just about anything else this sh...”

“This strain was an interesting discovery for the group.  We found ourselves sitting around the kitchen table just passing each bowl.  Kings was a little ruff causing Cough Dancing.  It got all of us talking and locked into our seats just having a nice relaxing conversation.”

“though its indica, I find this strain better for activities like exercise and house cleaning. Don't use it and try to nap, it is too bright for me to sleep, my mind churns and churns and my legs feel twitchy as though my body is like hey
column4: let's get moving". probably great for sporting events and concerts where there's cheering
column5: colors and energy all around. I've never had an indica this bright. get some and hit up t...”"

column3: “I'm a big kush fan especially the kings kush this has a real nice kushy piny like smell. It for sure takes care of a lot of back pain where its a indica dominant strain. It does have some sativa like traits but I would leave this strain for the night I would not operate heavy duty equipment on this once because it can leave you feeling very stoned and stuck to a couch somewhere. I would personally give it a ten but I...”

“Great smell, very sticky and good taste
It takes over your body and mind slowly but very potent. Felt relax and was crackin up like crazy. 
A must.”
“Super chilled high. Takes a few minutes to hit you but when it does it takes you to a whole new world! Great taste as well”

“This is a beautiful, sparkly smoke with a deep body stone perfect for unwinding after a hard day's work or for sleeping through a cold. This is a perfect bud to have in the medicine cabinet for sleepless nights and hard days.”

“Pretty nice for evening/unwinding use. Nice sweet fruity flavor, not as harsh as other kushes. Hits with a head high initially, which gradually develop into a relaxing body high. Quiets the mind after a stressful day and releaves arthritis and post surgical pain (I had ankle reconstruction surgery 4 months ago that still hurts a lot).

Nice MMJ for pain and insomnia. Possibly gives you munchies. I wouldn't use it dur...”

“nice sticky crystally buds.......smoking in a vaporizer for fybromyalgia. it is a nice creeping high. started nice and mellow and kept on going until i went to bed. pain relief 8 out of 10...made me sleep well.”

4/28/2014
Tried it in my new vaporizer. Worked quickly to reduce my pain and I spent a few hours with the family then slept well. I did get itchy that night but I suspect that was from ...”
“Versatile in low quantities, can get sleepy with too much. Good price makes this an easy purchase.”

“Real nice, relaxing, enjoyable high. Very smooth, I could swear I taste grape on my exhale...
Not the most ridiculous cooked feeling, but definitely a nice way to slow your day down!”

“All hail King's Kush! This has been the potent knockout indica I've been looking for. Really solid creeper knockout, it really helped me sleep and took away my pain/anxiety too. This strain is a great indica. Honestly there's not much more I can say... go, get it!!”

“During the winter I had a knee injury from snowboarding. Unfortunately, the pain from this injury came creeping up on me during my last 2 months of school. My buddy reccomended his strain of King Kush. From what I was told, it was a big pain reliever. Luckily, this stuff was a miracle. I was on it until the end of school. The smell is magnificent, the taste is delicious and it's medical effects are unbelievable. I wa...”

“This strain was an interesting discovery for the group.  We found ourselves sitting around the kitchen table just passing each bowl.  Kings was a little ruff causing Cough Dancing.  It got all of us talking and locked into our seats just having a nice relaxing conversation.”

“Just picked up this strain and damn!! Don’t flex you don’t wanna miss this beautiful strain! You will not regret it 
Only way this review gets a thumbs down is you sir or ma’am don’t have the real tree! 👑🤘”

“Just picked up this strain and damn!! Don’t flex you don’t wanna miss this beautiful strain! You will not regret it 
Only way this review gets a thumbs down is you sir or ma’am don’t have the real tree! 👑🤘”
“A good smooth nighttime strain.. Has a Berry sweet flavour”

“Be Prepared to Melt into the couch.  This one I like when I’ve had one of those days where nothing went right.  After a nice meal sit on the couch and get the Netflix rolling.  Settle in to the deep effects of this indica.  She’s gentle cerebrally, but your body will feel warm and relaxed.  I really love this strain.”

“Though it is a Indica i find it very uplifting and i get things done around the house but at the same time i can still relax and watch some t.v. To me it tasted really gasoline like and it was a little bit spicy and earthy with a hint of grapefruit don't recommend for new smokers because i found this strain was very harsh on my throat and still burned 20 minutes after having a hoot.”

“King's kush is made for kings! this strain is dank! I packed a bowl and smoked it with my friend,  it wasn't even phat! We didn't even finish it because after a few hits we were stoned! Very kiefy and dense! all around dank bud.”

“One of the best purple strains out there(some cuts are green ours isn't started from seed purple through and through). It takes over your body and mind slowly but very potent. Felt relax and was crackin up like crazy. 
A must.”

“I'm a big kush fan especially the kings kush this has a real nice kushy piny like smell. It for sure takes care of a lot of back pain where its a indica dominant strain. It does have some sativa like traits but I would leave this strain for the night I would not operate heavy duty equipment on this once because it can leave you feeling very stoned and stuck to a couch somewhere. I would personally give it a ten but I...”

“I finally found you! AMAZING! For Years i've been searching for that same Weed in and out phases" head almost tripping high from when I was a kid! My tolerance is threw the roof and tbh its super depressing
column4: but lastnight a dab of 93% THCa King Kush Shatter smashed straight threw my ever growing tolerance like a brick threw glass! i was back! stoned like i was 13 again ;)”"

column3: “Be Prepared to Melt into the couch.  This one I like when I’ve had one of those days where nothing went right.  After a nice meal sit on the couch and get the Netflix rolling.  Settle in to the deep effects of this indica.  She’s gentle cerebrally, but your body will feel warm and relaxed.  I really love this strain.”

“This strain was an interesting discovery for the group.  We found ourselves sitting around the kitchen table just passing each bowl.  Kings was a little ruff causing Cough Dancing.  It got all of us talking and locked into our seats just having a nice relaxing conversation.”
“Definitely a plant I would try again! I did not get to smoke as much as I would have liked to so I could give a detailed review, but it is called King" Kush for a reason. It took a bit to set it
column4: but it was well worth the wait. However
column6: I was wiped out. I call it "knock-out" marijuana
column7: because it's so good it knocks you out. I slept like a baby the whole night!”"

column3: “taste is fantastic. very sweet and helpful with pain and muscle spasms.”
“Great daytime smoke. Big dense nugs with a frosty coat of trichomes and super smooth smoke no matter what device you use. Very uplifting for an indica strain”

“nice sticky crystally buds.......smoking in a vaporizer for fybromyalgia. it is a nice creeping high. started nice and mellow and kept on going until i went to bed. pain relief 8 out of 10...made me sleep well.”
“Average bud. Good for a relaxing movie night or if you just got off work. 3.5/5 - Good for Stress, Anxiety, Pain Relief, and Muscle Spasms.”

“Not your typical Indica. Very energetic mentally. Lots of deep introspective thinking but without any negative loops. It is a happy rather than euphoric strain and it is incredibly long-lasting. No anxiety problems but I still would not recommend this strain for beginners because it is pretty psychedelic. At the end of the ride you are let down easy and can go right to sleep. It really is fit for a king and would be ...”

“The effects of the body are really strong. It had hallucinogenic affects on me—felt things there that weren’t, felt like sometimes inanimate objects were talking. So it all sounds fun, right? But I think because I have social anxiety and already have a tendency to feel paranoid at night, this wasn’t  good for the cerebral effects it had on me. I felt very paranoid and felt that things were there that were not. Ladies...”
“Wow!! Very tasty. Great high. I'm in love!!😻”

“Impressed! Lover of Indica; although, reading the negative side effects had me leery so, I decided to wait until evening to put one up. To my surprise King's Kush not only has a sweet berry  earthy flavor, the overall feeling is sublime. Mood totally chill, munchies at minimum, and I'm not glued to anything. Now, it's definitely not for beginners; though for those who appreciate OG Kush, you will enjoy this! Throw on...”

“Nothing too amazing but not to be ignored either.  It delivers an effect of intense relaxation and calms down the body. Clears head. Pretty nice vibe for bedtime. Body feels like butter, so anyone with pains should definitely consider this.”

“Awesome strain,I find myself thinking out any problems I might be facing and quickly finding smart solutions to them at incredible pace. For me this strain throws my mind into overdrive,really gets me to think things through if I wasn't think them through enough sober.
Great strain for after work relaxation,not only does it stimulate my mind but it puts me in a very relaxed body state as well.

For me this strain is ...”

“His Majesty has dense, dark buds tinted with royal purple. The King delights the senses with his sweet flavor and aroma. The King's Royal Edict to relax will be impossible to resist. Long Live the King!”
“Sweet strain, nothing relatively exceptionnal. Gets you in goood mood for starting the day! :)”

“Had some that was grown locally and honestly the buds are pretty but the bug was sooooo dry the taste was gone Im honestly gonna have to track a better grown version of this strain down to get a better experience it wasn't bunk just had absolutely no taste pretty heady effect though”

“I don't usually rate strains... but I just smoked a small 1 Pape of this after getting 2 grams of it from my dispensary. super gooey sticky as hell and amazing trichome coverage with a dense and colourful appearance. 
this stuff tastes INCREDIBLE I cannot stress enough how amazing this strain tastes in my opinion. it's like a breath of easy to inhale piney and kushy" overwhelming Arma and flavour with a DISTINCT gra...”"

“A little goes a long way with the King.

Being an indica with THC as high as 20%, this makes for an extremely potent and enjoyable high. I ease into a gentle but strong feeling of euphoria and deep thought and then it sends me to space. Long lasting, you don't need to smoke much at all to feel its full effects. My new favourite indica.”
“A damn good nighttime burn. Great body high. Definitely relieves pain and stress! I HIGHLY recommend this strain.”
“Definitely a creeper. Made me super high but put me on my ass for sure.”
“loved it ! Great taste this strain is loud i could smell it through the bag  Really good to smoke right before bed.”
“good body & mental high, especially body after”

“My new favourite heavy indica. Great low to mid range pricing. Beautiful kush flavour (Canadian spelling)  super smooth smoke. Definitely a creeper tree. Effects take 5-10 minutes to really kick in. This is a strong night time blaze. It will knock you out, spent a week using it as a daytime daily driver and found myself with sleepy eyes half passing out drifting into a daydream at random points of the day. I've never...”
“Very relaxing, beautiful high.”

“This was the first strain I smoke since a month, its definitely potent and took over my body which made it hard for me to move which lead to relax so its perfect if you want to skip a long time of your day.
I hated the taste - gives you cotton mouth - takes over you slowly - I noticed also it takes over my mind to float in a certain way to think about our creater and think in a different way.”
“My Buds are grape sweet an sour no menthol aroma. Please change the favor an effect about this strain cause they are wrong”
“This was one of the best kush strains I've tried, sadly I only got a halfq at the time.. Great smooth lavender taste and smoke, potent but not too heavy. A perfect kush hybrid.”

“This strain is very potent, I've been building up a tolerance but this one really get a me high and so pain free and relaxed. I was surprised how strong it was great flavor been smoking this as my number 1 lately”
“My Buds are grape sweet an sour no menthol aroma. Please change the favor an effect about this strain cause they are wrong”
“This was one of the best kush strains I've tried, sadly I only got a halfq at the time.. Great smooth lavender taste and smoke, potent but not too heavy. A perfect kush hybrid.”

“This strain is very potent, I've been building up a tolerance but this one really get a me high and so pain free and relaxed. I was surprised how strong it was great flavor been smoking this as my number 1 lately”
“very reminiscent of the high i would get with KING KUSH. Kings Kush is a creative and euphoric high. helps you not focus too much on your aches or pains. SMOKE IT!”
“I love it. I am smoking it now and it gets me very high. it also makes me sleepy -yawn-”

“This is a great sit back n relax, in your own world strain.  Having a high tolerance, insomnia & pain,my 1st toke went straight to my head, immediate head high. earthy fruity aroma with a bold similar taste”

“Og Kush x NY Diesel, another baby from Tha (Green) House.
it deserves the 4 stars,good smoke in the evening time,make you feel smooth and relaxed just as the real Kush should do. No Summer Daytime Consumption 'cause than you'll be not able to move a muscle.
Sweet as a candy and spicy in the background you'll appreciate even the citrusy after the combustion just if it has been grown properly 
Dude n carpet”
“Good head buzz now worry about pain”
“I love it. I am smoking it now and it gets me very high. it also makes me sleepy -yawn-”
“Great indica for pain relief. Big buds and tasty smoke.”
“A good excellent high and it took away my pain and I feel so wonderful I will really buy this again any day any time”

“This is a great sit back n relax, in your own world strain.  Having a high tolerance, insomnia & pain,my 1st toke went straight to my head, immediate head high. earthy fruity aroma with a bold similar taste”

“Good head buzz now worry about pain”

“It's a creeper! I smoked half a joint, barely felt any effect.  So, I made dinner.  lol Then, when the timer went off, I realized how absolutely stoned I was!  Wow.  Really good for my paranoia, I feel so calm.  This is probably a good one for PTSD.  <3”
“In my favorite strains. Great ull body experience”
“In my favorite strains. Great ull body experience”
“Body buzzzzz”
“smells good and super potent!”
“It helped with my current mouth pain and lack of appetite. I was very relaxed and hungry and after a nice meal, it put me straight to bed!”
“The taste is absolutely delicious; and the name is well deserved.  just a small amount will do the trick!”
“The smoke was very smooth with a fruity, earthy taste. It gave me an intense body high and I melted into my bed and slept through the entire night.”
“Surprised it's a Indica very uplifted powerful dreamy but relaxful. Had me thinking about everything great high.”
“very relaxing, puts me to sleep within an hour of vaping it.”
“Surprised it's a Indica very uplifted powerful dreamy but relaxful. Had me thinking about everything great high.”
“Great strain creeps up then hits you hard”

“very relaxing, puts me to sleep within an hour of vaping it.”
“A Well rounded, heavy bodied indica thats smokes very well. It creeps up on you a little bit and leaves your body very relaxed while uplifting your mood”
“It creeps up on you in the greatest sense of the word. Nice body relaxation first,  then a numbing relaxing cerebral high.  Pain minimal, fantastic calming effect, chill and happy.”
“Pretty enjoyable. Mixed with vivans it gave me a headache, but if I only smoke the bud, it's a bomb ass buzz.”

“Impressed! Lover of Indica; although, reading the negative side effects had me leery so, I decided to wait until evening to put one up. To my surprise King's Kush not only has a sweet berry  earthy flavor, the overall feeling is sublime. Mood totally chill, munchies at minimum, and I'm not glued to anything. Now, it's definitely not for beginners; though for those who appreciate OG Kush, you will enjoy this! Throw on...”

“One of my favourite strains I have on rotation. Works wonders for my anxiety. Uplifting and happy, not racy! Stimulates an appetite, something a lot of strains don't do for me. This strain will give you the giggles.”
“The smoke was very smooth with a fruity, earthy taste. It gave me an intense body high and I melted into my bed and slept through the entire night.”

“I grew the high CBD King's Kush Auto from Greenhouse seed co. The plant I grew had a really piney smell , almost like pinesol. The taste is sweet and floral. I immediately felt a nice warm bath of euphoria flow over my whole body. Relaxing and chill. The high CBD part balances out the THC , so this one is in no way overpowering.”
“Great strain creeps up then hits you hard”
“my favorite shop in town bystanders are the most honest people I know”
“amazing so sweet , tasty , and amazing. high”
“Sweet strain, nothing relatively exceptionnal. Gets you in goood mood for starting the day! :)”
“A Well rounded, heavy bodied indica thats smokes very well. It creeps up on you a little bit and leaves your body very relaxed while uplifting your mood”

“Definitely a strong head high over a body high and very munchie centric. At least in my experience with this strain. Little over an hour of high hang time, very relaxing and tastes absolutely phenomenal. Will totally buy again, just will make sure to stock up on healthy snack options.😉”

“Very smooth smoke with a fruity, earthy taste. This strain really creeps up on you and didn't take too much flower to take effect. I melted into my bed after about 30 minutes of relaxing and then drifted off to sleep and slept straight through the night until morning.”
“It was love at first glance lol the color of this bud was amazing! Very smooth, with great flavor. A second helping will do the body good :)”
“complete couch lock but best dope ive ever tried in my life”
“A delicious Indica Hybrid. Great effects, good to smoke and then sleep.”
“pretty chill high.  i felt chill, sleepy, eyes were heavy but a good mellow high.  gf felt focused but also chill, no pain, content high with no dry eyes.”
“Amazing flavor!”
“Extremely potent strain and I've had a lot.. Definitely one you want to get your hands on if you can..#presidential smoke”
“Was super relaxing I love it kept my mind off things”
